name: Generic Game Title
description:
This was a mobile game made in 5 hours (specifically 5h 10m 34s)

Don't have much to say, but this was a challenge i set to myself, this is the second time i tried this challenge because i had a hard idea to make in a day.

The game basically has you push buttons on time and gives you points, but its the only thing i chould've done in 5 hours (with the knowlage i have soo far)

Also never made a mobile game before soo enjoy!

(I haven't stopped working on my first game just wanted to try this challenge because yes, and i am still working on it and i think this year it will get out, the idea was just soo big to make in just months)
